Package com.persistentsystems.socketclient.sockets.interfaces

Interface IBlockingGetterSetter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRequireAll
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WrBlockingSocket
    public interface IBlockingGetterSetter
extends IRequireAll
    This interface is applied to the internal WrBlockingSocket.

    The intent of this interface is to support composition over inheritance when building our own internal socket classes. There's no forseeable reason for a customer to need to extend this class

    • Method Detail

      • get

        WrJsonResult get​(String xVariable)
          throws WebSocketTimeout
        gets a value from the api
        Parameters:
        xVariable - string representation of the variable
        Returns:
        returns a WrJsonResult when the call is completed
        Throws:
        WebSocketTimeout - throws if the websocket timeout WrBlockingSocket.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT is hit.

      • command

        WrJsonResult command​(ICommand xCommand)
              throws WebSocketTimeout
        sends a command to the api. Right now, there is only one command available SuspendCommand. Others may be added in the future.
        Parameters:
        xCommand - A class implementing the ICommand interface
        Returns:
        returns a WrJsonResult when the call is completed
        Throws:
        WebSocketTimeout - throws if the websocket timeout WrBlockingSocket.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT is hit.

      • validate

        WrJsonResult validate​(String xVariable,
                      String xValue)
               throws WebSocketTimeout
        Validates (IE confirms that the variable/value pair are acceptable to this radio) a given variable with value.
        Parameters:
        xVariable - variable name ot validate
        xValue - value to validate
        Returns:
        returns a WrJsonResult when the call is completed
        Throws:
        WebSocketTimeout - throws if the websocket timeout WrBlockingSocket.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT is hit.

      • validate

        WrJsonResult validate​(WrVariablePair xPair)
               throws WebSocketTimeout
        validates the given WrVariablePair is acceptable to this radio
        Parameters:
        xPair - a WrVariablePair containing the variable/value to validate
        Returns:
        returns a WrJsonResult when the call is completed
        Throws:
        WebSocketTimeout - throws if the websocket timeout WrBlockingSocket.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT is hit.

      • validate

        WrJsonResult validate​(WrSetVariableList xList)
               throws WebSocketTimeout
        Validates a list of WrVariablePair, ensuring they are acceptable to the API
        Parameters:
        xList - a WrSetVariableList of pairs to validate
        Returns:
        returns a WrJsonResult when the call is completed
        Throws:
        WebSocketTimeout - throws if the websocket timeout WrBlockingSocket.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT is hit.

      • networkGet

        WrJsonNetworkResults networkGet​(String xCmd)
                         throws WebSocketTimeout
        Issues a network get to the api A network get means that all available radios (in the `Managed Node List`) will return the requested variable value.
        Parameters:
        xCmd - the variable to get from all nodes
        Returns:
        returns a WrJsonNetworkResults when the call is completed
        Throws:
        WebSocketTimeout - throws if the websocket timeout WrBlockingSocket.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT is hit.

      • networkGet

        WrJsonNetworkResults networkGet​(WrGetVariableList xList)
                         throws WebSocketTimeout
        issues a network get to the api
        Parameters:
        xList - a list of variables to get from each radio
        Returns:
        returns a WrJsonNetworkResults when the call is completed
        Throws:
        WebSocketTimeout - throws if the websocket timeout WrBlockingSocket.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT is hit.

      • networkSet

        WrJsonNetworkResults networkSet​(String xVariable,
                                String xValue)
                         throws WebSocketTimeout
        issues a network set to nodes on the network via the API
        Parameters:
        xVariable - variable to set on all (reachable) nodes on the network
        xValue - value to set into the variable
        Returns:
        returns a WrJsonNetworkResults when the call is completed
        Throws:
        WebSocketTimeout - throws if the websocket timeout WrBlockingSocket.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT is hit.

      • networkSet

        WrJsonNetworkResults networkSet​(WrVariablePair xPair)
                         throws WebSocketTimeout

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        returns a WrJsonNetworkResults when the call is completed
        Throws:
